bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. of liver accumulation overcoming the spleen. When spleen qi fails to move, transmission and transformation end. San yin ji yi bing zheng fang lun 三因極一病證方論 11: 肝氣不平，勝克於脾，脾 郁不行，結聚涎沫，閉於臟氣，腑氣不舒，胃則脹滿，其脈弦遲 , “When the liver qi is not balanced and manages to overpower the spleen, [this brings forth] pent-up spleen [qi] and [this qi] fails to move. This results in nodular collections with saliva turning into foam. The qi of the depots is locked in, and the qi of the palaces cannot move freely. As a result, the stomach is distended with a feeling of fullness, and the [movement in the] vessels is string-like and retarded”.
